description: n-th number k such that every base 2 digit of k is a base 8 digit of k.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (Haskell)import Data.List ((\\), nub)a037377 n = a037377_list !! (n-1)a037377_list = filter f [1..] where   f x = null $ nub (ds 2 x) \\ nub (ds 8 x)   ds b x = if x > 0 then d : ds b x' else []  where (x', d) = divMod x b-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 30 2013
author: _Clark Kimberling_
